hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that a #tent in the valley# covers a #Great Fairy Fountain#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Goron City# is on the way of the hero.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #Hyrule Field# is on the path to #the Tower#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Map of the Fire Temple#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Forest Temple Compass#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that ##Zora's Fountain## has #2# major items.

GC (Maze).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Jabu Jabu's Belly Compass#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Map of the Water Temple#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #Epona's Song# can be found at #Zora's Fountain#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that the #Temple of Time# chimes with the music of #a Zora Scale#.

HC (Malon).text: They say this game has just a few glitches.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# hoards #the Forest Medallion#.
hinted_locations: Deku Tree Lower Lobby Recovery Heart

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Lon Lon Ranch# is on the way of the hero.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Forest Temple Compass#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# hoards #a Strength Upgrade#.
hinted_locations: Deku Tree Slingshot Room Side Chest

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Map of the Water Temple#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Dodongo's Cavern Compass#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #the Boomerang# and #the enemy souls of Gerudo Training Ground#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that the #Water Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Jabu Jabu's Belly Compass#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Fire Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

LH (Lab).text: They say that ##the Gerudo Training Ground## has #8# major items.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that the #Gerudo Horseback Archery# rewards...^ #the Biggoron Sword# and #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Heart Container#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# is on the path to #the Tower#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple MQ Map Room Enemy Chest

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that the #rainbow bridge# leads to #Dodongo's Cavern#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: While you're wasting time reading this hint, the others are playing the seed.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Dodongo's Cavern Compass#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #Bongo Bongo# holds...^ #the Hover Boots# and #the enemy souls of Lake Hylia#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that the Zora's Domain #diving game and torch run# lead to...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #the Fire Arrows#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that a #cow behind webs# in a grotto gifts #a Red Rupee#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Blue Potion Bottle# and #a Map of the Ice Cavern#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Heart Container#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that the #Shadow Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Red Rupee# and #a Heart Container#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Map of the Fire Temple#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# hoards #a Recovery Heart#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple MQ 3 Spinning Pots Rupee 2

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that plundering #outside Ganon's Castle# is a foolish choice.
